radialaggro.configuration.fadeIn.tooltip: If true the indicator will fade in when it appears
radialaggro.configuration.fadeOut.toolti: If true the indicator will fade out when it disappears
radialaggro.configuration.hideInView.too: If true the indicator will be hidden when the entity is within the player's field of view
radialaggro.configuration.indicatorDurat: The duration in ticks that the aggro indicator will be shown for
radialaggro.configuration.initialAggro.t: If true the indicator will be shown when a mob first targets the player
radialaggro.configuration.invertBlacklis: If true the blacklist will be inverted to a whitelist, meaning only entities in the list will show the indicator
radialaggro.configuration.radiusScale.to: The scale of the radius of the aggro indicator. Higher values will make the indicator appear further away from the center of the screen
radialaggro.configuration.symbol.tooltip: The symbol used for the aggro indicator. This can be any single character or a string of characters
radialaggro.configuration.symbolColorBlu: The blue value of the symbol color rgb
radialaggro.configuration.symbolColorGre: The green value of the symbol color rgb
radialaggro.configuration.symbolColorRed: The red value of the symbol color rgb
radialaggro.configuration.symbolRotation: If true the symbol will not rotate to match the direction of the entity, it will always be upright
radialaggro.configuration.symbolScale.to: The scale of the symbol used for the aggro indicator. Higher values will make the symbol larger
